translations: v.（非正式）（演员）虚假表演；（角色）表演过火

phrs.translation: 美国呼克, 霍克, 名字, 天天新网友

sentences.sentence: I'll hoke up a good alibi.
sentences.translation: 我会编一个滴水不漏的遁词。

sentences.sentence: Many writers hoke up the play to make people laugh and cry and make a lot of money.
sentences.translation: 为了使人们发笑或落泪从而赚很多钱，许多作家对剧本勉强拼凑。

sentences.sentence: HOKE realizes that no two plants are exactly alike and can offer you custom designed solutions to meet your unique process flow control component requirements.
sentences.translation: 霍克认识到，没有两个工厂是完全一样的，可以为您提供设计方案，以满足您的独特流程控制部分的要求定制。
